statements: UPDATE transaction_history SET customer_id = 1001, transaction_amount = 500.00 WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE transaction_history SET transaction_amount = 750.50, transaction_date = '2022-06-15 10:30:00' WHERE customer_id = 2002;
UPDATE transaction_history SET transaction_amount = 100.50, transaction_date = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 1 AND customer_id = 101;
UPDATE transaction_history SET transaction_date = '2022-02-20 15:45:00', transaction_amount = 75.25 WHERE customer_id = 201 AND transaction_id = 3;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 1000.50 WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE audit_logs SET action = 'Updated' , timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE log_id = '78901234-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001';
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 1000.50, transaction_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE audit_logs SET action = 'UPDATE', timestamp = NOW() WHERE log_id = '98765432-12ab-34cd-56ef-098765432109';
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 5000.00, transaction_timestamp = '2022-03-15 10:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE audit_log SET user_id = 1001, action_timestamp = '2022-03-16 14:45:00' WHERE log_id = 67890;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 500.00 WHERE transaction_id = 1001
UPDATE audit_log SET action = 'Approved', user_id = 101 WHERE log_id = 500
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', username = 'newusername' WHERE user_id = 'aabbccdd-1234-5678-90ab-cdef01234567';
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 500.00, description = 'Payment for services' WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE transaction_logs SET log_description = 'Transaction approved', log_date = NOW() WHERE log_id = 'd63e6010-6f90-49c5-ba97-94bf6cc9c171';
UPDATE account_details SET balance = balance + 1000 WHERE account_id = 12345;
UPDATE transaction_details SET amount = 50.00, transaction_date = '2023-01-15 09:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 54321;
UPDATE transaction_details SET amount = 1500.00, transaction_date = '2022-05-15 09:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE account_details SET balance = balance - 500.00 WHERE account_id = 2001;
